HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: <color=orange><size=22>New features & balance update</size></color> |img:UpdateNews/1_1/NewCommands|img:UpdateNews/1_1/NewResearch|img:UpdateNews/1_1/FuelForSale| |<color=orange><size=18>New features</size></color> * Refueling pods fleet from inventory. * Quick buy fuel command. * See how much and where fuel is for sale. |<color=orange><size=18>Balance</size></color> * Increased research cost. * New fuel efficiency research. * Pods needs 80% of HP to launch (careful in raids!). |<color=orange><size=18>Fixes</size></color> * World view hiding after launching pods.
